subject: Cricket (Game)
Apartheid (Policy)
Blacks
lead_paragraph: The South African government's refusal to accept D'Oliveira in 1968 as a member of the England touring team was a tipping point as South Africa became isolated in the world of sports.
snippet: The South African government's refusal to accept D'Oliveira in 1968 as a member of the England touring team was a tipping point as South Africa became isolated in the world of sports.
